Add subtitles automatically with just one tap. With BIGVU auto cap, you will get the BIG video editing experience in the palm of your hand! BIGVU automatically transcribes your video into a storyboard with captions perfectly in sync with your narration.
Add text to video to display subtitles for viewing when sound is muted. With captions, 37% more viewers are encouraged to turn the sound on.

The best trimmer to cut your videos
Cut your videos by just selecting the words where you want your video to start and end.

Boosted Audio
It’s one tap to remove background noise and maximize audio levels.

Video Styling Editor
Brand your story with the BIGVU Teleprompter. Add your custom logo and pro-quality looking titling.

Crop videos
With BIGVU, crop your videos to square for Instagram or Facebook. It’s one tap to select a region and format your video to square, vertical or horizontal.

BIGVU is a WEB and Mobile App
Access desk.bigvu.tv from a computer with the same email and password. Create awesome videos with visuals, and stunning text graphics with the BIGVU composer, an online video editor lets you easily edit your captions from your computer. Mix your presentations with photos, video shots, motion titling, and tweets, to spice up your videos and captivate your audience.

Background Music
Add a copyright-free music track to give an emotional touch to your narration.

Intro & Outro
Add a video opener or an animation outro with an elegant business card animation with your business contact info.

Cloud Storage
Upload your clips to desk.bigvu.tv to free up space on your device. desk.bigvu.tv is easily accessible through a computer with the same user and password.

Chromakey - Green Screen
If you record with a green screen background, it’s one tap to replace the green color with any image or video loop using our advanced chromakey subtraction algorithm.

Video Marketing Stories
Download an MP4 video file to upload in Wistia, Vidyard, Brightcove, Kaltura, Buffer, Hootsuite, Ripl, WIX, Vimeo, Lightricks.

Collaborate on Video Creation with BIGVU Workgroup
Get your team to create videos like pros.
- Streamline your workflow - Get your script written by a colleague automatically right in your mobile app.
- Shared workspace - Upload your videos to a shared workspace where others can review, edit and publish the final package.
- Shared Media Library - Organize your brand photos and videos into folders and share them with your team.

creator: BIGVU - Vlogging, Auto Subtitles, Green Screen
descriptionHtml:
Create stunning videos for marketing or education, using "BIGVU Teleprompter" professional tools.

Our features include a top class video Teleprompter, Automatic Captions with Highlights, Green Screen background replacer, advance editing capabilities including Music background, Cropping and Trimming, exclusive branding with your Logo and Business card, Innovative publishing capabilities, including Sharing to multiple social medias in one click, and our special video Landing Pages.


BIGVU Teleprompter - Desktop and Phone together for the perfect video!


"BIGVU Teleprompter" offers you two main platforms for professional video creation:
Our app, "Teleprompter BIGVU", which you are on its app page right now, and our web platform, which you can use on your computer.
Even using only the app or web platform, you can make professional videos with BIGVU's features, including the Teleprompter, Automatic Captions, and the ability to edit and publish your videos.
However, using both platforms, is the way to maximize "BIGVU Teleprompter" potential.
For example, you can write the Teleprompter script with a keyboard using the Web version, film using the app's teleprompter wherever you are and finalize the video using our Web expanded video editing suite, the Video Maker.

Find "BIGVU Teleprompter" website using this link: https://bigvu.tv (The web version is adapted for Desktop / Laptop usage. please avoid using it with your phone)


BIGVU Teleprompter - Features:


★ Teleprompter
Write a script on your phone or computer, and then record with the Teleprompter, And Keep your eyes on the camera while reading the script on the screen.
No one will know you’re reading. 😊

★ Automatic Video Captions
Add Subtitles to your video and substantially improve your video quality. you can use one of our pre-prepared caption designs, or create your own branded design (Available only on our web version). Our AI will automatically understand what you are saying on the video, and insert the captions in the right spot. The AI will also enhances your captions by highlighting key points, increasing engagement. Don't worry, you can always edit manually afterwards.

★ Word trim
Part of the video came out bad? Don't worry. You can quickly trim your video by selecting the words where you want your video to start and end. Could not be easier.
In our Web platform, You can even re-record the bad part using the teleprompter, and then connect the new recording to the old one using our sequencer.

★ Music background
Add background music to your video and attract attention. Choose the loudness of the music in relation to your voice.
Use one of "BIGVU Teleprompter" pre-prepared music options, or upload one of your own.

★ Green screen
Use "BIGVU Teleprompter" Green Screen replacer to add stunning backgrounds to your video.
You can use one of our backgrounds, or upload one of your own.

★ Share
"BIGVU Teleprompter" integrates to your social media channels, and you can post your video to all of them in one click.
Alternatively, you can download your video to your phone or computer, and post it manually.

★ Many more!
"BIGVU Teleprompter" has so many more features you can use, all to make your video as professional and elegant as possible. All that's left is to start exploring yourself!

For more information, email "BIGVU Teleprompter" Support: support@bigvu.tv

creator: BIGVU Video Studio
descriptionHtml:
BIGVU (pronounced BIG VIEW) is a top class video teleprompter, automatic subtitling, chroma-key green screen background replacement, advanced video editing capabilities including adding music backgrounds, crop, trimming, branding your video with your logo, and adding a video animation with your business card contact details.
It's one click to post on your social video channels or create a video landing page with your video at the center.

Teleprompter - With the BIGVU teleprompter, your videos look natural. Maintain eye-contact, keep your eyes on the teleprompter camera while reading the script on the screen. No one will know you’re reading. 😊

Script - copy and paste from any app your script into the teleprompter.

Web & Mobile Teleprompter - With the same user and password, access the BIGVU teleprompter on your mobile device or on your computer. Edit easily your subtitles on any device.

Auto-Captions - Add automatic subtitles, and make your videos speak even with the sound off. Have you already tried automated video captioning with BIGVU? One click and your video is automatically transcribed. Then easily edit and highlight keywords on the web or mobile app. Color your presentation subtitles by highlighting keywords and easily editing your subtitles on the web or mobile app. Automatic transcriptions for your teleprompter stories is available in 70 languages.

Video Trimmer - Made a mistake using the teleprompter? cut your teleprompter videos by selecting the words where you want to start and end. Video editing could not be simpler.

Music background - Add a copyright-free music track to give an emotional touch to your narration.

Maximize Audio Levels - It’s one tap to remove background noise and maximize audio levels.

Vlogs with your brand and style - Brand your blog stories by adding your custom logo and pro-quality-looking titling to your vlogs. Your blog video content needs to stand out, make your vlogs concise by recording your scripts with a teleprompter and video with elegant subtitles.

Script - copy and paste from any app your script into the teleprompter.

Web & Mobile Teleprompter - With the same user and password, access the BIGVU teleprompter on your mobile device or on your computer. Edit easily your subtitles on any device.

Auto-Captions - Add automatic subtitles, and make your videos speak even with the sound off. Have you already tried automated video captioning with BIGVU? One click and your video is automatically transcribed. Then easily edit and highlight keywords on the web or mobile app. Color your presentation subtitles by highlighting keywords and easily editing your subtitles on the web or mobile app. Automatic transcriptions for your teleprompter stories is available in 70 languages.

Video Trimmer - Made a mistake using the teleprompter? cut your teleprompter videos by selecting the words where you want to start and end. Video editing could not be simpler.

Music background - Add a copyright-free music track to give an emotional touch to your narration.

Maximize Audio Levels - It’s one tap to remove background noise and maximize audio levels.

Vlogs with your brand and style - Brand your blog stories by adding your custom logo and pro-quality-looking titling to your vlogs. Your blog video content needs to stand out, make your vlogs concise by recording your scripts with a teleprompter and video with elegant subtitles.

title: Teleprompter & Video Captions

container.value:
CC WEIZERMAZARS LLP
135 WEST 50 STREET
New York 10020
USA

creator: BIGVU Video Studio
descriptionHtml:
The BIGVU Teleprompter and Captions App is the easiest way to create attention-grabbing captions for talking videos.

Make videos like a pro:
- A premium video teleprompter app: Read your script from a smart teleprompter and record from the front-facing camera at the same time. Change text scrolling speed, monitor audio while recording video, and lock auto-exposure.
- An auto-captions app for automatic closed-captions and subtitles - BIGVU generates a perfectly synched transcript of your teleprompter video with automatic subtitles to edit and fine-tune.
- Color your captions for talking videos by highlighting keywords and easily editing.
- Video editor - optimize for social media, crop your video to square, vertical or horizontal to increase the impact of your Facebook or Instagram videos. Add automatically subtitles and colorful captions.
- Collaborative social video maker - get your script written by a fellow colleague automatically right in your teleprompter video maker app.
- AI Video Script generator - get your ideas transformed in seconds into your perfect script with integrated ChatGPT. It’s one tap to load the script on your teleprompter.
- Chromakey green screen background replacement - if you record with a green screen background, replace the green color with any image or video loop using our advanced chromakey subtraction algorithm.
- Music background: add a copyright-free music track behind your narration to give an emotional touch to your narration.
- Boost audio levels - maximize audio levels when you record the video from a distance without an external microphone.
- Online video editor - access desk.bigvu.tv from a computer to create awesome videos with visuals, and stunning text graphics. Our online video editor will let you mix your presentations with photos, video shots, motion titling, and tweets.
- Automatically transcribe into captions and cut your videos by just selecting the words where to start and end
- Translate any subtitles to over 70 languages
- A teleprompter for video vlogging - Upload your MP4 with elegant subtitles to Descript, Jasper, Wistia, Vidyard, Brightcove, Kaltura, Buffer, Hootsuite, Ripl, or Vimeo. So get a more formal look at these platforms with the video teleprompter.
- Vlogs with your brand and style - Brand your blog stories by adding your custom logo and pro-quality-looking captions to your vlogs. Your blog video content needs to stand out, make your vlogs concise by recording your scripts with a teleprompter and video with elegant subtitles.
- One-click share to your device camera roll, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Messenger, or WhatsApp.

More than 7 million businesses of all sizes use BIGVU (pronounced "big view") to make thousands of videos everyday ▶ :
- marketing video builders and video marketing consultants
- coaches, teachers, e-learning and training video creators
- sales professionals for product pitches and customer testimonials
- public speakers relaying on a teleprompter
- social video’ makers
- video bloggers and editors
- vlogs
- youtube video creators
- mobile journalists
- artists recording video profiles and casting performances
- editors of explanation or commentary videos

With the teleprompter, read your script from the screen while keeping your eyes on the camera. Make your videos look polished - no one will know that you're reading from a teleprompter!

Generate a script in seconds using the BIGVU AI Script Writer. Using the same AI writing technology as ChatGPT, Descript, and Jasper, create scripts that make you sound like an expert. Send the  AI Writer script to the teleprompter and hit record!

Check our website
https://www.bigvu.tv
https://bigvu.tv/create/auto-captions
https://bigvu.tv/create/teleprompter-app
https://bigvu.tv/create/ai-magic-writer-for-video-scripts

Subscribe to our YouTube channels for training videos on how to make great videos with BIGVU teleprompter: https://www.youtube.com/c/bigvu

creator: BIGVU AI Creator for Talking Videos
descriptionHtml:
The BIGVU Teleprompter and Captions App is the easiest way to create attention-grabbing captions for talking videos.

Make videos like a pro:
- A premium video teleprompter app: Read your script from a smart teleprompter and record from the front-facing camera at the same time. Change text scrolling speed, monitor audio while recording video, and lock auto-exposure.
- An auto-captions app for automatic closed-captions and subtitles - BIGVU generates a perfectly synched transcript of your teleprompter video with automatic subtitles to edit and fine-tune.
- Color your captions for talking videos by highlighting keywords and easily editing.
- Video editor - optimize for social media, crop your video to square, vertical or horizontal to increase the impact of your Facebook or Instagram videos. Add automatically subtitles and colorful captions.
- Collaborative social video maker - get your script written by a fellow colleague automatically right in your teleprompter video maker app.
- AI Video Script generator - get your ideas transformed in seconds into your perfect script with integrated ChatGPT. It’s one tap to load the script on your teleprompter.
- Chromakey green screen background replacement - if you record with a green screen background, replace the green color with any image or video loop using our advanced chromakey subtraction algorithm.
- Music background: add a copyright-free music track behind your narration to give an emotional touch to your narration.
- Boost audio levels - maximize audio levels when you record the video from a distance without an external microphone.
- Online video editor - access desk.bigvu.tv from a computer to create awesome videos with visuals, and stunning text graphics. Our online video editor will let you mix your presentations with photos, video shots, motion titling, and tweets.
- Automatically transcribe into captions and cut your videos by just selecting the words where to start and end
- Translate any subtitles to over 70 languages
- A teleprompter for video vlogging - Upload your MP4 with elegant subtitles to Descript, Jasper, Wistia, Vidyard, Brightcove, Kaltura, Buffer, Hootsuite, Ripl, or Vimeo. So get a more formal look at these platforms with the video teleprompter.
- Vlogs with your brand and style - Brand your blog stories by adding your custom logo and pro-quality-looking captions to your vlogs. Your blog video content needs to stand out, make your vlogs concise by recording your scripts with a teleprompter and video with elegant subtitles.
- One-click share to your device camera roll, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Messenger, or WhatsApp.

More than 7 million businesses of all sizes use BIGVU (pronounced "big view") to make thousands of videos everyday ▶ :
- marketing video builders and video marketing consultants
- coaches, teachers, e-learning and training video creators
- sales professionals for product pitches and customer testimonials
- public speakers relaying on a teleprompter
- social video’ makers
- video bloggers and editors
- vlogs
- youtube video creators
- mobile journalists
- artists recording video profiles and casting performances
- editors of explanation or commentary videos

With the teleprompter, read your script from the screen while keeping your eyes on the camera. Make your videos look polished - no one will know that you're reading from a teleprompter!

Generate a script in seconds using the BIGVU AI Script Writer. Using the same AI writing technology as ChatGPT, Descript, and Jasper, create scripts that make you sound like an expert. Send the  AI Writer script to the teleprompter and hit record!

Check our website
https://www.bigvu.tv
https://bigvu.tv/create/auto-captions
https://bigvu.tv/create/teleprompter-app
https://bigvu.tv/create/ai-magic-writer-for-video-scripts

Subscribe to our YouTube channels for training videos on how to make great videos with BIGVU teleprompter: https://www.youtube.com/c/bigvu

title: Teleprompter & Video Captions

creator: BIGVU AI Subtitles & Prompter
descriptionHtml:
"Enhance your video creation with the BIGVU Teleprompter and Captions App, your all-in-one solution for producing engaging and professional video content.

Teleprompter Excellence
Experience premium teleprompter functionality with our feature-rich app. Easily read your scripts using our smart teleprompter while recording from the front-facing camera simultaneously. Adjust text scrolling speed, monitor audio levels in real-time, and lock auto-exposure for a flawless recording experience. With the BIGVU Teleprompter, maintain eye contact with your audience effortlessly

Effortless Captioning
Unlock the power of automatic closed-captions and subtitles with BIGVU. Our advanced technology perfectly synchronizes transcripts with your teleprompter video, generating subtitles that are ready for editing and fine-tuning. Highlight keywords and customize captions to add a vibrant touch to your talking videos.

Video Editing at Your Fingertips
Transform your videos into social media sensations. Crop your content to square, vertical, or horizontal formats for maximum impact on platforms like Facebook and Instagram. Our built-in video editor lets you easily add colorful captions and subtitles. Plus, seamlessly integrate copyright-free background music to enhance the emotional appeal of your narration.

Collaborative Video Creation
Collaborate effortlessly with colleagues using our social video maker. Have your scripts generated automatically right within the app, courtesy of our AI Video Script generator powered by ChatGPT. Load your script onto the teleprompter with a single tap.


Green Screen Magic
Recording against a green screen background? No problem! Utilize our advanced chromakey subtraction algorithm to replace the green color with any image or video loop, elevating the visual quality of your videos.

Versatile Integration
Export your MP4 videos with elegant subtitles to platforms like Descript, Jasper, Wistia, Vidyard, Brightcove, Kaltura, Buffer, Hootsuite, Ripl, or Vimeo. Maintain a professional image across these platforms by utilizing our video teleprompter.

Branded Vlogs
Make your blog stories stand out by adding custom logos and professional-quality captions to your vlogs. Craft concise and engaging content by recording your scripts using our teleprompter and incorporating elegant subtitles.

Seamless Sharing
With just one click, share your content to your device's camera roll, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Messenger, or WhatsApp, reaching your audience wherever they are.

Trusted by over 7 million businesses of all sizes, BIGVU is the go-to tool for:

- Marketing video builders
- Coaches, teachers, and e-learning creators
- Sales professionals for product pitches and testimonials
- Public speakers relying on a teleprompter
- Social video enthusiasts
- Video bloggers and editors
- Mobile journalists
- Artists recording profiles and casting performances
- Explanation and commentary video creators

Experience the difference with BIGVU's teleprompter and captions app. Craft professional videos with ease and precision. Say goodbye to awkward pauses and hello to seamless, engaging content.

Visit our website for more information:

BIGVU Website - https://bigvu.tv/
Auto Captions - https://bigvu.tv/create/auto-captions
Teleprompter App - https://bigvu.tv/create/teleprompter-app
AI Magic Writer for Video Scripts - https://bigvu.tv/create/ai-magic-writer-for-video-scripts

Join our community and access training videos on how to create stunning videos with the BIGVU teleprompter on our YouTube channels:

BIGVU YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/c/bigvu

Elevate your video content with BIGVU's teleprompter and captions app – your trusted partner for professional video production."

creator: BIGVU AI Subtitles & Prompter
descriptionHtml:
Want to create professional presentation videos 10x faster? Loved by 10 MILLION businesses, vloggers, and video makers, the BIGVU Video Teleprompter & Captions App is your pocket AI-powered video studio.

With just a few taps on the BIGVU Teleprompter & Captions App, you can generate an engaging script, record while reading from the pro autocue, add subtitles for videos, and publish to all social media accounts at once.

ELEGANT TELEPROMPTER VIDEO APP
Maintain eye contact with the camera while reading your script as it scrolls up the pro video prompter
Adjust text scrolling speed, font size, and starting point to read at your natural pace
Retouch with beauty filters on camera: cover up blemishes, whiten teeth, smooth skin or add makeup
Blur background, pause on silence and lock auto-exposure for a premium teleprompter recording experience

ACCURATE SUBTITLES FOR TALKING VIDEOS
Automatically add video subtitles with the subtitle ai generator
Grab attention with stylish subtitle themes and highlighted keywords
Translate the auto-generated closed captioning to over 70 languages

AI TELEPROMPTER SCRIPT WRITER
Generate a personalized autocue script and video content ideas with the integrated AI GPT Script Writer
Create video scripts for social media, sales letters, and vlogs using AI voice-to-text templates.

AI VIDEO MAKER AND EDITOR APP
Automatically resize and crop your video clips to square, vertical, or horizontal formats for maximum impact on platforms like Instagram (posts, stories, and Reels), TikTok, and YouTube
Add your branding, photos, logo, and background music with the built-in video editor
Trim and cut your clips by choosing the words in your transcription script
Replace a green screen background with any image or video loop thanks to BIGVU’s advanced chromakey subtraction algorithm
Best Vlog maker- add custom logos and professional-quality subtitles to your vlogs. Craft concise and engaging vlog content by reading teleprompter floating notes and scripts

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTING AND VIDEO MESSAGING
Share your video content simultaneously on YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn Twitter, Messenger, or WhatsApp, from the palm of your hand
Convert leads with personal email video messaging and video landing pages
Track your video’s performance across all platforms with the social media dashboard
Send your video over email, with the thumbnail of your video

TEAM AND CLIENT VIDEO COLLABORATION FOR MARKETING AGENCIES
Create dedicated video workspaces for departments and clients.
Add to each workspace dedicated branding, scripts, video projects, and social media channels.

SYNC MOBILE APP AND ONLINE DESKTOP PLATFORM
Teleprompter for iPad, iPhone, Android, iOS and online on the web.
Sync your account across multiple devices and work from wherever is convenient for you

The BIGVU teleprompter & subtitles app is your all-in-one solution for professional videos. Easily generate engaging scripts, read from the teleprompter, add captions for videos, and share on social media. Say goodbye to awkward videos and hello to engaging content- Download today!
